channel.title: Any one got 508 chaotic maul model + ints?

item.title: Any one got 508 chaotic maul model + ints?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Loll Mr_Loll
item.description:
@Mr_Loll wrote:

case ####: <— ID Over the # (remove them.)
class19.aRSStringArray340[1] = Class112.method1668(43, “Wear”);
class19.anInt330 = 35084;//inventory/drop model

class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves
class19.anInt344 = -1;//women sleeves
class19.anInt387 = 35085;//female model id
class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, “Chaotic Rapier”);//Item Name
break;

return 813;
